SEARCH
Package Customers

Class CustomerManagement

java.lang.Object
Customers.CustomerManagement
public class CustomerManagement extends Object
This class provides methods for managing customers in a retail system. It includes methods for viewing all customers, viewing a specific customer, adding a new customer, editing a customer, and deleting a customer.

  • Constructor Details

    • CustomerManagement

      public CustomerManagement()

  • Method Details

    • customerManagement

      public static void customerManagement(Employee employee)
      This method provides a menu for managing customers. It allows an employee to view all customers, view a specific customer, add a new customer, edit a customer, and delete a customer.
      Parameters:
      employee - the employee who is managing the customers

    • customerSignUp

      public static void customerSignUp()
      This method allows a new customer to sign up. It prompts the user to enter their name, username, password, and phone number. The user is then asked if they want to sign up for a rewards program. If they choose to do so, they are prompted to enter their email address and a RewardsCustomer object is created. If they choose not to sign up for the rewards program, a Customer object is created. The new customer object is then serialized and saved to a file.

    • customerAccountManager

      public static void customerAccountManager(Customer customer)
      This method allows a customer to manage their account. It provides a menu for the customer to view their account information, edit their account information, or manage their loyalty account (if they are a RewardsCustomer).
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer who is managing their account
